body.p: CrossOver 6.2 was released by CodeWeavers today, with the following changes:

ul.li: Added a dock presence for running Applications.
Dramatic improvements in performance on OS X Leopard.
many other Mac OS X and Linux fixes.

body.p: CrossOver is a commercial version of Wine by CodeWeavers that allows users to support Wine. You can find out more about this release by reading the official announcement. There is also a fun promotional video out comparing the performance of Wine versus our competitors.
There are free trials available for download for both Mac OS X and Linux.
